name: RENEW (REcycling Nation's Electronic Waste) Programme
description: RENEW is a flagship e-waste recycling programme launched by StarHub on Earth Hour in 2012. As an info-communications services provider retailing electronic products, RENEW reflects StarHubâ€™s commitment to environmental sustainability. RENEW received The Green Award at the Asia Communication Awards for two years running, in 2014 and 2015.

name: Singtel x SingPost ReCYCLE
description: The Singtel x SingPost E-waste Recycling Programme, launched on World Environment Day, 5 June 2017, is a collaboration between the two leading ICT and postal companies as part of their environmental sustainability efforts.

name: Punggol Eco-Drive
description: Virogreen (Singapore) Pte Ltd, in conjunction with Punggol 21 Community Club Management Committee (CCMC) organises an e-waste recycling programme for Punggol North residents.

name: M1 E-waste Drop-Off Point Programme
description: The M1 Drop-off Point Programme is a joint effort between M1 Limited & Virogreen (Singapore) Pte Ltd to promote responsible disposal of e-waste.

name: E-waste Recycling @ North East
description: E-waste Recycling @ North East is a collaboration between NECDC and Virogreen (Singapore) Pte Ltd to promote responsible disposal of e-waste.

name: Shell-Metalo E-waste Recycling Programme
description: Shell-Metalo E-waste Recycling Programme is a collaboration between Shell Eastern Petroleum Pte Ltd and Metalo International Pte Ltd to raise awareness and to increase public convenience of e-waste recycling.

name: City Square Mall E-waste Recycling Programme
description: Go green and bring your electronic waste (or e-waste) to our L2 Customer Service Counter for recycling! These include unwanted PCs, phones, radios, kettles and so on.

name: Project Homecoming - Ink & Toner Cartridge Recycling Programme
description: Singapore's first joint printer brand ink and toner cartridge recycling initiative is led by Canon and Epson, and supported by TES, the National Library Board (NLB) and NEA.
